google_play_reviews.content: I have a new problem. Sometimes the export doesnt work and I try over and over multiple times to export my work, plz fix this as well in The next update
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
There is probably an issue with storage permission. Make sure Mooltik is closed. Go to Settings, search for app permissions, find Mooltik, then on/off the storage permission for Mooltik. After that try exporting again.
If that didn't help, try restarting your phone then exporting.
